page.title: 01SAINT JOHN'S HALL CHURCH
page.content: St.John's Hall Church is a hall church not a church hall.The altar that faces North,not East can be closed off so that the rest of the church can be used for other activties such as aerobics, blood-donor clinics, nursery groups etc.Beside the altar there is a sliding door leading to a little chapel for use during the week. This chapel can also be entered from the main porch.Beside these rooms are five others; a kitchen,three Sunday School rooms and one for storing tables and chairs.
